sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import NavBar from './NavBar' import axios from "axios" export default class Data extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { listOfCards: [], //continue adding to this list when things come up... } } componentDidMount() { const username = window.localStorage.username; axios.post('/load', {username}) .then(res=> { this.setState({listOfCards: res.data}) }) } render() { const username = window.localStorage.username; return (

{username}'s Custom Cards

{this.state.listOfCards.map(card => )}
Name Mana Cost Card Type Abilities Flavor Text Rarity
{card.name} {card.manacost} {card.type} {card.abilities} {card.flavortext} {card.rarity}

Add a card below:









) } }
